titleInfo.title: Charter of B'nai B'rith Colorado Lodge 2271

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 10 x 8 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''Charter of B'nai B'rith Colorado Lodge 2271, est. April 26, 1960, #394.''

mods.abstract: Photograph of the framed charter of B'nai B'rith Colorado Lodge, No 2271. The charter is dated April 26, 1960 and signed by the Lodge President, 1st Vice President, 2nd Vice President, and Secretary as well as the B'nai B'rith President and Secretary.
mods.note: Donated by B'nai B'rith Colorado Chapter #2271.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
